titleStmt.title: These are to will and require you, that forthwith upon sight hereof you make your personall appearance with your shovell and pik-axe before us the commissioners appointed for the survey of the high-waies at the gravell-pits near Palmers Green: ...

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
A satirical document purporting to be an order from "the Commissioners for the Survey of the High-waies" requiring persons to appear "with shovell and pik-axe at the gravell-pits near Palmers Green".
Dated at end: Given under our hands at the gravell pits the 28. day of May, 1658.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
